ComicInfo.Summary:
Micheal's office is "blowed up real good". She saves Dan but ends up in the hospital. Someone attacks Michael in the hospital.
Michael checks out and meets Edwards, finally. She visits Mike Jr who later is kidnapped. A mysterious packet, intended for Micheal has been stolen.
